General.Name: Danasupra Erapacific Tbk
General.Description: PT Danasupra Erapacific Tbk engages in leasing, factoring, and consumer financing activities in Indonesia. It offers financing for used and new cars, such as sedan, multipurpose and sport utility vehicles, pick up vehicles, trucks, and buses; and housing, home stores, home offices, condominiums/apartments, and small offices home offices. The company also provides financing facilities for procurement of capital goods, including heavy equipment for mining, industry, plantation, and forestry; and various purposes comprising marriage, home renovation, travel, worship, education, and other consumption purposes. In addition, it provides funds for investment, and working capital purposes. PT Danasupra Erapacific Tbk was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
